title: Ticket #4900: Add remapping of job input file name
description:
Adds a new job ad attribute called TransferInputRemaps. File name remapping in this list will be applied to input file names when the starter downloads input files while starting a job. The format of the remapping specification and the mechanism is the same as for remapping output file names.

See branch V8_3-Vuosalo4900-branch
remarks:
